pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimally Refine Strata // Splits initial strata into refined strata that optimize covariate balance. For more information, please email the author for a copy of the accompanying manuscript. To solve the linear program, the 'Gurobi' commercial optimization software is recommended, but not required. The 'gurobi' R package can be installed following the instructions at https://www.gurobi.com/documentation/9.1/refman /ins_the_r_package.html.
